TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content: Nice start on the Ariane 5!

Wait, you're doing a 3.75m Ariane 5?

But we did one!

Unless I'm mistaken you mean shadow did one. This is what people are talking about when they criticize you.You may not realize it but you are claiming credit where you haven't appeared to have earned it and it makes some people sick.

I wish we had rockets as cool as the French!

As a french I wish we had R-7 rockets... Well, thing happens in guyana at least

And agreed with Kibble, ariane 4 is badass !

Oh my god all my yes.
So much win ! I can't wait !!

Many thanks

Wait, you're doing a 3.75m Ariane 5?

But we did one!

No problem, the modding ecosystem is quite large.

Plenty of Ariane rockets out there already.

Hey-hey, nice Ariane V, Beale! I wanted it for quite a long time, glad you decided to make it. :3

And one more post about my interplanetary ship project now it has a name, "Avrora".

This time, I have established a com network, consisting of 4 "Pochtalyon" (Mailman) and 1 "Mayak" (Lighthouse), which was really unfortunate: first launch (4x"Pochtalyon") had one satellite's fuel tank leaking, meaning that it won't be able to fix its orbit if something goes wrong, and then, Block D batteries died, meaning that it and 2 other satellites are left unactivated as debris.

The second launch (also 4x"Pochtalyon") was more successful, this time, I was able to deploy all four satellites, leaving two of them on 2Mm x 2Mm orbit in case I'll need reserve, but Block D suffered a monoprop tank leak, but there was enough reaction wheel power for it to operate properly

Third launch brought Mayak to polar 87 degrees orbit with a 3h period without any problem, so we are good and will have Internet on Eve

So, that's all preparation work, now it's time for making the ship itself!

http://imgur.com/a/8oyly

Really nice!

I really like the Russian naming, it works nicely. And I might steal "Mayak"

The final comm. network looks good, I prefer all Molniyas because they take less effort, but it's cool when everything is all set up neat!

More, this is kind of wonderful (despite the leak!):

I can't wait to see more

Nice start on the Ariane 5!

Thanks!

Is more:

It has been unexpectedly difficult due to Ariane's unique colour scheme.

ALSO!

Light brick, or dark brick?

Any um chance...maybe...of getting an Ariane 4? :3
As a french I wish we had R-7 rockets... Well, thing happens in guyana at least

And agreed with Kibble, ariane 4 is badass !

Ariane 4 is quite interesting.

Difficulty is, I am not so sure I have a payload for it!

I forgot about the ESA Soyuz Rockets, that's cool!

Edited April 25, 2015 by Beale

Holy noot noot of pingus ! I like pretty much light bricks ( are you talking about the split between brick right now ? ) and both are just nice.

3.75m parts were really needed in my gamedata since I deleted the nasa parts and using AB Launchers now I can build the monster of my dreams, monday will see some frankenstein's rockets, Vulkan/energia with proton and ariane stuff in the top of it to launch soviet space race era scrap

Little edit: Well played, ariane tank colors are just beautiful !

edit 2: I just noticed how fast you create and texture all this stuff, you are allowed to take a break you may work 24/7 to get such content ( well, I will not complain for this )

@Niemand, you make a very good point. Beige stays.

Some problem with lighter bricks however (The specular lighting made them look a bit awkward at a far distance), to try a different approach, just some tone variance between the different bricks.

Speaking of specularity, there is clearly a black sheep in the launcher family... (Hint, the one on the right).

TLV:

The scale is a bit odd in general!

Perhaps the R1 should have been in a smaller size.

Soyuz is still not quite the smallest rocket, that honour goes to the Antares
Are you making an Ariane 5 just to spite Augustus?

I'd much prefer if Beale made historical Ariane rockets, or Long March rockets.

I'm the creator, and as I just said, I'd prefer if our paths did not conflict.

This is completely inappropriate to ask of Beale, or of any mod author for that matter. This is in very bad form.

Additionally, @Beale, you nailed the brick texture. Looks fantastic. I'll be glad to have something to loft the ATV to orbit with now! The .craft repository will one day be complete! As soon as I have my last final, and I can allow myself to load KSP back up onto my computer with a stable list of mods, It's all-hands to the .craft files.

Edited April 25, 2015 by curtquarquesso

A small addendum to the "Avrora", the ship itself and first expedition on a Pauk-P with the international crew: Jeb, Bill and Bob from Kerbal States and Abram, Iosif and Valentin from Kerbiet Union. Their goal was to test life support mechanisms from Thunder Aerospace and repairing a broken battery on the command module of the propulsion block.

Are you making an Ariane 5 just to spite Augustus?

Beales one of the nicest guys on the forum, and augustus is acting out of line if he takes offence at having some crossed paths/competition AGAIN(see his previous attempt to take over maintenance of the bargain rockets mod only to get upset and quit when roverdude said he would do the same). If Beale wants to make an ariane 5 its the same reason he made the r7, or the photon, or the antares its because he has a payload for it (the ATV).

I put a Soviet surprise in a very well known rocket, and I regret nothing!

Were all those fuel leaks from test flight or something else?

Excellent posting of an infrastructure mission
Woah! Awesome space station part revamps, Beale! I like the new additional one-crew part too.

I'd much prefer if Beale made historical Ariane rockets, or Long March rockets.

I'm the creator, and as I just said, I'd prefer if our paths did not conflict.

This is kinda overstepping your bounds, you aren't the one that chooses what goes into Tantares.

Ariane looks amazing. I can't wait to fly it (plus more 3.75m engines are always fantastic!).

For the rest of y'all, any suggestions for more retextures I can make? I've got finals week, but after that I'm free, and I don't plan to be updating to 1.0 immediately so I know I'll keep mod compatibility for now.
My gosh, I've been a busy bee lately when it comes to this game! I thought you'd be proud of all of monstrosities, this one included!It's like the ISS, combined with Salyut, combined with Mir!
